author: Staff Reporter
text: On account of Tiruvalluvar Day, leaders of various Tamil organisations paid floral tributes to the 133-foot statue of saint poet Tiruvalluvar in Kanyakumari on Saturday. Kumari Historical and Cultural Research Centre president T. Velappan and its general secretary S. Padmanabhan and others paid tributes to the poet. Founder of Tirukkural Research Centre Kesavasubbiah, its secretary Kumari Selvan also garlanded the statue.
title: Floral tributes paid to saint poet Tiruvalluvar
